episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came to the
beach at night.
There, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw...

Oh! What are you doing out here at this
hour, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Huh? Me?

Exactly what it looks like! I was just out for
a swim!
(Express concern since it’s so late.)
That’s...true!

I got so carried away that before I knew it,
it was dark!

(Caution that the ocean is dangerous
at night.)
That’s true. I need to be careful!

I was just having so much fun, I lost track
of time!
Thanks for worrying about me!

But do you really think the great Misty, the
Tomboyish Mermaid, needs someone to
worry over her? Not a chance!

I’m a water expert! I can’t have folks
worrying about me at the beach!

All right! Before it gets even later, I guess
I should head home!

What’s that? You’ll walk me home,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

Got it! Let me change out of this swimsuit
real quick!
All done!
Huh? Why was I swimming in the ocean?

Well...I was just feeling a little worked up
about something.

Whenever I get like that, I like to clear my
head by swimming in the big, open ocean.
What was I upset about?

Don’t worry about it! I had a good swim,
so I’m fine now!
Not to mention...

Snooping into a girl’s secrets isn’t very
considerate, now, is it?
Just kidding! Hahaha!
On another day...

[Name:PlayerNickname ] once again saw
Misty at the beach.

[Name:PlayerNickname ]? We seem to be
running into each other a lot lately.

Don’t worry! I’m not going for another late
swim today.
I was just...well, thinking about something.

Yeah. Last time we talked, I was pretty
upset.

Looking back on it, I guess I was in a worse
state of mind than I thought.
You know my policy, right?

To deliver an all-out offensive with my
Water-type Pokémon.

But here on Pasio, people battle with their
Pokémon in all sorts of ways.

I’ve encountered new ways of battling I’ve
never seen before.

So I was thinking if I want to get stronger,
my policy might not be enough.

If I want to keep up, maybe I need to be
more fluid and adaptable, like water.

(Encourage her to stay true to
herself.)
Yeah... If I can, I want to.
(Tell her you like her policy.)
You do?

I feel like I’ve been questioning myself
over and over.

But hearing that cleared up all my doubts!
Thanks!

It just wouldn’t be me to not go on an
all-out offensive with Water-type Pokémon!

Testing out different strategies is important,
of course...

But there’s no reason to change what I
like most!

Ever since we met, you’ve always been true
to yourself. From here on out, I’ll follow your
example!

Ahhh... Now that I’m feeling better, I already
want to jump right back in the ocean!

C’mon! Let’s swim together until the sun goes
down, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
